name: Demon Dodger
description:
The player receives three health points (HP) and a mission: to last as long as possible without getting hit by the demons dropping from above. Several modern games inspired five different levels/worlds. Each level feels familiar, but unique in its own way and so are the demons that occupy them. The music is also pretty lit.



Features
  • On screen score keeper
  • Rad music
  • Temporary speed boosts available with just a click of a button
  • Codex of demon damage points and speed
